name: KaBlam!
overview: KaBlam! is a sketch comedy television series that ran from 1996 to 2000. It features a collection of short films in several different styles of animation, bridged by the characters of Henry and June, who introduce the shorts, and have adventures of their own. The show ended its three-year run nine months short of four years on January 22, 2000.

episodes.name: You've Tried the Rest! Now Try the Best!
Won't Stick to Most Dental Work
episodes.overview:
Sniz and Fondue Clubbed: Sniz's attempt to make his brother happy only causes trouble when they owe a music company big bucks.

Action League Now! Big Baby: A huge baby is accidentally released by The Mayor at a show of Freaks. The Baby tries to get Quarkey and he succeeds. Can The Action League stop this baby?

Prometheus and Bob Pottery: Prometheus attempts to teach Bob pottery.

Life With Loopy Butterfly Loopy: Loopy caccoons into a beautiful butterfly!

Henry & June Theme  Henry gets so upset at June making him the butt of too many jokes that he quits. June makes the most of single-host-dom, but then gets a new co-host, Hector, who is pretty but can barely pronounce his own name.

Prometheus & Bob  Pet

The Little Freaks  When the evil-fashioned villain No Face plans to control what the humans wear by releasing starving moths to eat the entire world's clothing, and then force them to wear his jump suits! First he could control what they wear, then what they think, and then, the world would be his! Fortunately, The Little Freaks are here to stop No Face in his tracks!

Doctor Worm  A wannabe-doctor who happens to be a worm sings a cute little song.

episodes.name: Under New Management
episodes.overview:

The Flesh rides the guinea pig around and catches the virus. The virus eats away at The Flesh's body parts. Can The Action League stay away from The Flesh until they find a cure?
